properties.name: io.data.encryption.secret-key
properties.description: The input can be of 128 bit or 192 bit or 256 bit. So if key size is 128 then "aesEncryptionKey" is a valid secret key because it has 16 characters i.e 16*8=128 bits.

properties.name: io.data.encryption.iv-key
properties.description:
The initialization vector is needed in case of CBC mode
The initialization vector size should be 128 bit
So if initialization vector size is 128 then "encryptionIntVec" is a valid initialization vector because it has 16 characters i.e 16*8=128 bits.
